name: imdi
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)))

stmt.origin: impbii(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)))

comment: Distributive law for implication. Compare Theorem *5.41 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 125. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
